p: Supplementary Fig. 19b compares the amplitude-derived diffusivity ( D) with D with-fusion, which shows a good correlation between them ( R 2 = 0.85), although D is generally smaller than D with-fusion when their values are low. This suggests that the amplitude-derived diffusivities (after excluding high SSE values) are reasonable indicators for the internal parameterization of soil thermal properties in land surface models.
